synopsis.text: Eiji Hashimoto and Shinya Umemura present a captivating spin-off of Chiruran Shinsengumi Requiem, depicting the most relaxed Shinsengumi warriors in history! Amidst the turmoil of Kyoto, where factions clash and violence prevails, the Shinsengumi emerges as the city's protectors, tasked with restoring peace. This spirited group of young samurai mercenaries is determined to prove their worth and save Kyoto, even if it means living and dying by the sword. Witness their unconventional everyday lives as they navigate political upheaval while embodying strength, intensity, and an undeniable charm. In this world, a man's true character is revealed in his final moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
